title: Integrate Pinterest Tag tracking code for conversion analytics

requirements.text: Add the Pinterest Tag tracking script to the HTML document head, loading the Pinterest conversion tracking library from https://s.pinimg.com/ct/core.js and initializing it with tag ID '2614024734220'
acceptanceCriteria: Pinterest Tag script is loaded asynchronously in the document head
pintrk function is initialized with tag ID '2614024734220'
Page view tracking is triggered on initial load with pintrk('page')
Noscript fallback img tag is included for non-JavaScript environments

requirements.text: Configure the Pinterest Tag to track page views automatically when the site loads
acceptanceCriteria: pintrk('page') is called after Pinterest Tag initialization
Page view events are sent to Pinterest analytics dashboard

constraints: Do not modify existing backend referral link tracking functionality
Preserve all existing frontend components and routing
Do not change the Internet Identity authentication flow
nonGoals: Implementing custom event tracking beyond page views
Adding email hashing or user identification logic
Creating admin interface for Pinterest Tag configuration
